tool_description: An API  for bypassing and recognizing SolveMedia Captcha
name: SolveMedia Solver
title: SolveMedia Solver

api_list.name: byImageFile
api_list.description: Solve the SolveMedia captcha via Image upload

api_list.name: bySiteKey
api_list.description: Solve the SolveMedia via site key method
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://solvemedia-solver.p.rapidapi.com/bySiteKey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "solvemedia-solver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
